attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has got to the point where the people born in britain are lower priority than immigrants to this country. We need to toughen laws soon like australia and america do. As long as we are TOO hospitable, this will continue. I feel rejected by my own government. Things need to change!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
